hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Light Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of the Triforce#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Lake Hylia# is on the path of #gold#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Fire Temple Compass#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #Bombchus (10 pieces)#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that ##the Sacred Forest Meadow## has #0# major items.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of the Triforce#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides the #Treasure Box Shop#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that a spider high #above the icy waters# holds #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Piece of the Triforce# and #a Map of Jabu Jabu's Belly#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Child Climb North Chest

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #an Ocarina#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of the Triforce#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the path of #gold#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of the Triforce#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Piece of the Triforce#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Shadow Trial Golden Gauntlets Chest

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Heart Container#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Hallway Left Invisible Chest

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #deep in the wasteland# is #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that ##Goron City## has #4# major items.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #chests past Dark Link# in the Water Temple hold...^ #a Zora Scale# and #a Heart Container#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that in #Gerudo Valley# the hammer unlocks #a Huge Rupee#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #the Hover Boots# can be found in #the Graveyard#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of the Triforce#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that the #final treasures of Ice Cavern# are...^ #a Jabu Jabu's Belly Compass# and #Saria's Song#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that crouch stabs mimic the effects of your last attack.

ToT (Left).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Piece of Heart#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs #Dampé's Hut#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Fire Temple Compass#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Piece of Heart#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides the #House of Skulltula#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of the Triforce#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the way of the hero.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the path of #gold#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Piece of the Triforce# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
